name: interactive-agent-sdk-playground
description: Interactive Agent SDK - Build AI agents that see and act in your app. Built on open MCP standards for tool integration and MCP Apps for rich UI experiences.

scripts.dev: concurrently -n next,bundle,samples -c cyan,yellow,magenta "next dev -p 3500" "npm run bundle:mcp-app:watch" "npm run generate:samples:watch"
scripts.build: npm run generate:samples && npm run bundle:mcp-app && next build
scripts.bundle:mcp-app: node scripts/bundle-mcp-app.js pages/examples/mcp-app-example/widgets/remote-url-app.tsx && node scripts/bundle-mcp-app.js pages/examples/document-edit/widgets/review.tsx && node scripts/bundle-mcp-app.js pages/examples/document-edit/widgets/review-mcp-app.tsx && node scripts/bundle-mcp-app.js pages/examples/bonsai-shop/widgets/product-card.tsx && node scripts/bundle-mcp-app.js pages/examples/bonsai-shop/widgets/cart.tsx && node scripts/bundle-mcp-app.js pages/examples/bonsai-shop/widgets/checkout-summary.tsx && node scripts/bundle-mcp-app.js pages/examples/product-enhance/widgets/enhance-mcp-app.tsx && node scripts/bundle-mcp-app.js pages/examples/mcp-apps/widgets/streaming-demo-app.tsx && node scripts/bundle-mcp-app.js pages/examples/headless-chat/widgets/weather.tsx
scripts.bundle:mcp-app:watch: concurrently "node scripts/bundle-mcp-app.js --watch pages/examples/mcp-app-example/widgets/remote-url-app.tsx" "node scripts/bundle-mcp-app.js --watch pages/examples/document-edit/widgets/review.tsx" "node scripts/bundle-mcp-app.js --watch pages/examples/document-edit/widgets/review-mcp-app.tsx" "node scripts/bundle-mcp-app.js --watch pages/examples/bonsai-shop/widgets/product-card.tsx" "node scripts/bundle-mcp-app.js --watch pages/examples/bonsai-shop/widgets/cart.tsx" "node scripts/bundle-mcp-app.js --watch pages/examples/bonsai-shop/widgets/checkout-summary.tsx" "node scripts/bundle-mcp-app.js --watch pages/examples/product-enhance/widgets/enhance-mcp-app.tsx" "node scripts/bundle-mcp-app.js --watch pages/examples/mcp-apps/widgets/streaming-demo-app.tsx" "node scripts/bundle-mcp-app.js --watch pages/examples/headless-chat/widgets/weather.tsx"
